summary: When a high-ranking government official's daughter's boyfriend is kidnapped, it's up to Mark Robinson and Phil Davids to find the shadowy organization responsible and bring them to justice.
cast: Frederick Offrein|Helle Michaelsen|Mats Huddén|Timothy Earle|Harley Melin|Tina Ljung|Ramon Sylvan|Magnus Cederblad|Gunilla Johanson|Peo Jansson|Taiho Alaskeri|Kenneth Ström|Eddie Swartz|Louise Tomason|Kitt Houen|Jalle Ahlström|Henrik Aineståhl|Mikael Andersson|Taggen Axelsson|Lotta Back|Bengtsson|Karl Mikael Bremer|Patrik Carlsson|Michael Christensen|Carina Collins|Mia Ericson|Karl-Johan Fröjd|Johan Gillgren|Bengt Haig|Charlotte Hasselgren|Mikael Hjort|Ingrid Högborg|Jan Johansson|Magnus Johansson|Patrik Johansson|Per Johansson|Robert Johansson|Thomas Johansson|Måns Jälevik|Henrik Larsson|Michael Lindström|Tommy Malm|Annelie Melin|Elenor Mouchard|Tony Mårdhage|Joakim Münz|Bill Nelson|Fredrik Niklasson|Lars Olsson|Håkan Ottosson|Bo Pelli|Edgar Persson|Ulrica Sandin|Hampe Soneby|Lars Soneby|Mats Sorting|Reine Sorting|Lars Wistrand|Sven Wistrand|Nils Wärpling|Joakim Österlund|Per-Erik Österlund

title: Russian Terminator
